A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Wow...just finally watched the last jedi and I picked up on so many things that were off.  Thinking that I must've been overthinking it...I check out the reviews\, and sure enough...the film was garbage and very obvious in it's attempts to cram liberal / feminist agenda down the audiences' throats.

First\, the objective review:
-Too many plot holes
-bad story
-unlikeable characters
-killed off too many main characters too fast

Second\, the additional "off-putting stuff":
-Blatant replace-male-with-female just for the sake of doing so
-Coerces the partisan / SJW agenda on audiences (it's not hard to leave this crap out...really...it isn't)
-(After seeing the reviews) critics accusing fans of intentionally down voting rating\, while not giving a thought to biased\, agenda-driven critics of likely intentionally up voting the rating
-Cultural appropriation of another group's story (come up with your own creations...then you can cram all the non-sense you want into it)

The film was just genuinely bad.  The biased agenda context both in and surrounding the film just drags it down more.
